name: beastsim
summary: BEASTsim (BEnchmarking and Analysis of Spatial Transcriptomics simulations) is an advanced benchmarking framework designed to assess the performance of various simulation techniques used in spatial transcriptomics. This tool provides standardized testing and evaluation metrics, enabling researchers to compare different spatial transcriptomics simulators and provides tools for analysis of such spatial data.
author: Tomás Bordoy García-Carpintero, Lucas Alexander Damberg Torp Dyssel
